website_summaries.verdict: The Fujifilm X100F is everything a premium compact camera should be, capturing SLR-quality images in a form factor that slides into your jacket pocket.

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE this camera.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is so much fun and easy to use. With the fitted leather case, it's easy to take everywhere, and the photos are wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: ChrisK

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable and interesting
customer_reviews.text: Early days, but so far an enjoyable and interesting camera to use. The clarity of the controls and how they operate is already giving me a much improved insight into the photographic process. The leaf shutter and integrated flash work particularly well together. A valuable supplement to a quality DSLR with zoom lenses rather than an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Kevan Greene

customer_reviews.title: Best camera I have owned (and that includes Leicas!!)
customer_reviews.text: Used for street photography and is great at getting the photo without being noticed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile Upgrade, great pictures and fun to use
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous camera, I owned the 100T and the 100F before that, this is even better and a worthwhile upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Rupert S. Brun

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. Paid a lot of money for a fixed lens camera. Yes it’s fast to auto focus and yes it as all the film simulations but it’s £1200. I ended up returning it and getting a Ricoh gr for £400. Same results and you get used to the slower auto focus. Save some money and get a gr
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: A stunning camera- superb image quality!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely delighted with this compact camera. Did a lot of research before buying and everything from build quality, user interface, controls and image quality is outstanding. Yes, it has a fixed lens and this maybe a constraint for some. Personally I think it’s a strength and bear in mind that there is a teleconverter at 50mm and 70mm within the menu interface. Love the film simulation options and the 1:1 format, if you decide to shoot at this ratio. Also got the Fuji lenshood and adapter ring to add protection along with a UV filter to protect the excellent lens. I could go on and on about this camera..... I love it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Argy58

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just knowing that your photos were taken using this beautiful device makes them look more amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Wombat

customer_reviews.title: Oh, that Q button.
customer_reviews.text: So much potential but for me didn’t quite make it. Daft as it sounds the Q menu button is in the wrong place just where your thumb rests so I kept turning on the menu which was annoying. I believe you can disable the button, but what’s the point? On a positive note it’s got a great wheel for adjusting functions. The image quality of the two Fuji’s I have had are for me questionable, I can’t say I hate them but there’s always something I am not too happy with. Hard to put a finger on. I think it needs another iteration, the 100 G or whatever with a few changes and it could become really good.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Fuji on a roll
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful camera, stunningly executed engineering that could only be improved by an articulated screen and a second card slot.
customer_reviews.author: thehappycyclist

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera from local store. So happy with purchase, really is a joy to use and picture quality is excellent. You won’t be disappointed with this camera. Am enjoying the built in lens, will save me so much money not buying more lenses and even better to just bring one campact camera with you while traveling. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: E

product_meta.title: Fujifilm X100F Mirrorless Digital Camera, Silver
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:SilverThe X100F features the latest image sensor and high-speed image processing engine to deliver the highest level of image quality and mobility in the series. This is the ultimate in premium compact digital camera, equipped with the Advanced Hybrid Viewfinder of enhanced convenience. While maintaining the elegant design that has proven to be popular, the new camera has been developed in pursuit for easy operability, reflecting requests from users of previous models.

BOX CONTAINS
Fujifilm X100F Silver, Li-ion battery NP-W126S, Battery charger BC-W126, Shoulder strap, Lens cap, Metal strap clip, Protective cover, Clip attaching tool, USB cable, Owner's manual
feature_bullets: Perfect for snapshots with quick response and enhanced AF performance
Intuitive and practical operability and camera body with luxurious tactile feel
Fujifilm X100F Silver, Li-ion battery NP-W126S, Battery charger BC-W126, Shoulder strap, Lens cap, Metal strap clip, Protective cover, Clip attaching tool, USB cable, Owner's manual
